Kreps, D.M. and R. Wilson, Reputation and Imperfect Information, Journal of Economic Theory, August 1982.
Kydland, F.E. and E.C. Prescott, Rules Rather than DIscretion: the Inconsistency of Optimal Plans, Journal of Political Economy, June 1977.
Milgrom, P. and J. Roberts, Predation, Reputation, and Entry Deterrence, Journal of Economic Theory, August 1982.
